entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
